column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were in a time crunch to make our 7PM jazz performance. Our choice was wait 55 minutes for a table or get a take out pizza in 40 minutes. We got the small Malnati Chicago Classic $16.25 to go. Waited at the bar and scarfed our pizza as we walked the 4 blocks to the jazz venue. I'll just say that this was an awesome pizza and it changed my opinion about Chicago pizza. Crust
column4: tomatoes... it all worked well together. I still like thin crust pizza better but if you are in Chicago
column5: you must eat here. Check it out.
